name: Desert Worm
description:
(It is recommended to play in fullscreen)

You're a worm that needs to eat people to grow.

Use WASD to move, use spacebar to launch in the sky and eat people.

You can also upgrade your worm after every 5th kill with either speed or size.

By the way!
I made this game for the Trijam 173 within 3 hours so I did not have enough time to implement the game over state, so when your hunger drops to 0 you are supposed to lose. Also I didn't have enough time to add a border, in case you want to go explore into nothingness :)
